actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of six employees of the Pearl Harbor Naval Shipyard, Department of the Navy, Pearl Harbor, Hawaii.

summary.text: Provides that six named individuals shall: (1) be relieved of any indebtedness to the United States for overpayment of per diem; and (2) be reimbursed for specified sums of travel expenses incurred while employed by the Department of the Navy.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of six employees of the Pearl Harbor Naval Shipyard, Department of the Navy, Pearl Harbor, Hawaii.
